root.name: Big League Sports
root.description: OverviewBig League Sports is a sports game that uses the Kinect that was developed by Robomodo and published by Activision for the Xbox 360 platform.GameplayIn Big League Sports players can only play the game using the Xbox 360 Kinect sensor. The game turns various motions into different moves in the sports. Players control as their created Xbox 360 Avatar.There are six different sports that can be played. Each sport has 2 mini-games and a full sport that can be played.SoccerScore KickerSoccer BlockerBig League SoccerFootballTD TossField GoalBig League FootballGolfDriving ContestPutting ChallengeBig League GolfBasketballShooting ChallengeShot BlockerBig League BasketballBaseballHomerun HeroFly BallBig League BaseballHockeySlapshot ChallengeGoalie GauntletBig League HockeyGames on DemandOn September 25th, 2012 Big League Sports was made available on Microsoft's Games on Demand service for $19.99 USD. The full download is 475.76 MB.
